SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.decks

Class Deck<T extends Drawable>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.decks.Deck<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements contained by the deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
VirtualDeck
public class Deck<T extends Drawable> extends Observable implements Serializable
An abstract representation of the concept of deck of a specified type of element. It allows the user to draw random elements from the deck.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • setDeckIdentifier

      public void setDeckIdentifier(int deckIdentifier)
      Allows to set the deck's identifier number. This value is used to recognise the deck.
      Parameters:
      deckIdentifier - the new identifier number for this deck.

    • draw

      public T draw()
      Allows to actually draw a card from the deck. Subclasses must implement this method in order to specify how the elements are drawn from the deck
      Returns:
      the drawn element

    • getTopOfTheStack

      public Resource getTopOfTheStack()
      Retrieves the Resource type of the card that's currently on top of the deck (which can be empty).

      This method should only be used when dealing with a Deck of PlayCards (or subclass).

      Returns:
      the element that's on top of the stack null if the deck's empty

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the deck is empty or not.

      The deck's empty if there's no card on top of the stack (thus, no stack)

      Returns:
      true if the deck's empty, false otherwise
